xml.name: Redundant type conversions
xml.Text: The Redundant type conversions inspection warns you about redundant type conversions that can be omitted. Consider the following example: s := string("") _ = s Here code converts a string literal to a string. It is a redundant action because the output is a string anyway.
xml.Try: Delete the unnecessary []byte conversion in the main function. Click []byte and press ShowIntentionActions.
Select Delete conversion and press EditorEnter.
